root.name: .find()

example.code:
pet = 'sea snail' println(pet.find('a')) # Prints the index of the 'a' in 'pet': 2. println(pet.find('a', 3, 7)) # Prints the index of the second 'a' in # 'pet': 6.
println(pet.find("snail")) # Prints 4.
println(pet.find("rock")) # Prints -1.

root.description: Return the lowest index in the string where a substring is found. Optional arguments start and end specify a range to search in. If the substring is not found, returns -1.
